title: Lowell National Historical Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       For the latest news and events happening at Lowell National Historical Park follow us on our social media accounts. News releases contain information of current interest. Like us on Facebook. http://www.facebook.com/Lowell.NPS Become a fan of Lowell on Facebook to follow park events, planning and to find out about new park programs.  Follow us on Twitter. http://www.twitter.com/Lowell_NPS Follow us on Twitter for up-to-the-minute updates and timely news tidbits. Find park photos on Flickr. http://www.flickr.com/groups/lowell_nps/ For unique and compelling images of the park.
